summary: App with movie articles/reviews management. Features time-limited articles (disappear after 24 hours) and a navigation option renamed from 'MANAGE REVIEWS' to 'Movie Reviews'.

existing_features.title: Rename the navigation option currently labeled 'MANAGE REVIEWS' to 'Movie Reviews' in all places it appears in the frontend (Header navigation, Footer navigation links, and any other UI references).
